pci_additional_ips_failoverip_order_desc: Additional IP addresses can be transferred from one server to another within the same cloud project, and the same continent.
pci_additional_ip_create_description: Expose your application with an agnostic IP
pci_additional_ip_create_step_attach_ins: Attach an IP to a specific instance or network
pci_additional_ip_failover_ip_descriptio: A solution optimised for OVHcloud cross-product failover operations. Manual configuration required, support for hybrid cloud use cases. Paid in advance.
pci_additional_ip_create_step_select_reg: Select a country for your new OVHcloud Additional IP
For more information on Additional IPs, click here.
pci_additional_ip_create_step_attach_ins: This IP will be directly connected to the instance (legacy mode, without Gateway). Please select an instance to use. A manual operation on the instance is required. More details here
pci_additional_ip_create_no_instance_mes: You do not currently have an instance to attach an Additional IP to. Please create one beforehand.
pci_additional_ip_floating_ip_descriptio: A solution optimised for Public Cloud use cases, automation (Terraform) and support for regional private networks. Available as a pay-as-you-go billing model.
pci_additional_ip_create_step_select_reg: Select a region for your new Floating IP
Can't find the region you want in the list? To learn more about product availability by region, click here.
pci_additional_ip_create_step_attach_ins: Only instances with private networks are displayed
pci_additional_ip_create_no_instance_mes: No instances with private network were found in the region selected. Please create one before attaching a Floating IP.
pci_additional_ip_create_summary_step_ga: A new Gateway instance is being created in the {{region}} datacentre.
pci_additional_ip_create_step_summary_ba: We have detected a Gateway already in use in the selected region: {{gatewayName}} A new Floating IP will be configured.

We have detected a Gateway in the selected region that can be used: {{gatewayName}} An ‘External Gateway’ (SNAT) option must be enabled on the Gateway to configure it with the new Floating IP. Do you wish to continue?
Yes, I want to enable the SNAT option on {{gatewayName}} and configure it with a new Floating IP.
